		MFG labtool Android build
		=========================

To rebuild labtool for platform which uses Marvell bluetooth stack, 
copy Host/DutApiWiFiBt/Android_refMake/Android_Mbt.mk to Host/Android.mk 
then build the labtool application.

To rebuild labtool for platform which uses BlueZ stack, copy 
Host/DutApiWiFiBt/Android_refMake/Android_Bz.mk to Host/Android.mk 
then build the labtool application.
